it.unibo.interfaces

Class SensorArduino

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibo.interfaces.Sensor
      • it.unibo.interfaces.SensorArduino
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISensor, java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HumidSensorArduino, LevelSensorArduino, LightSensorArduino, RainSensorArduino, ShockSensorArduino, SpeedSensorArduino, TempSensorArduino

    public abstract class SensorArduino
extends Sensor
implements java.util.Observer
    Phisical sensor implemented on Arduino. The sensor implemented on the Arduino uses serial comport to request data to microcontroller. Arudino interprets commands and responds with the requested data. Using calls to the serial: getHumidity= getTemp= getSpeed= getLight= getLevel=
    Since:
    05/feb/2015 18:25:08
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    matteo.mariani11@studio.unibo.it

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      OnBoardDebugger deb 
      java.lang.String value
      for communication with arduino need value return and serial com driver serial com is not real time communication, arduino need time to elaborate request so need Thread that attend replay, and debugger for problem
